markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Blast Suit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1601)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafted from heavy steel plating and riveted together with cunning precision, this suit of _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_ is specifically designed to protect against sudden explosions. This added layer of security comes at the cost of movement, however.

<document level="2" id="action-1220" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Blast Suit
